titleStmt.title: Reasons for vnitie, peace, and love with an answer (called Shadows flying away) to a book of Mr. Gataker, one of the assembly, intituled, A mistake, &c. and the book of the namelesse author called, The plea, both writ against me : and a very short answer, in a word, to a book by another namelesse author called, An after-reckoning with Master Saltmarsh, and to Master Edward his second part called, Gangrena, directed to me ... / by John Saltmarsh ...
titleStmt.author: Saltmarsh, John, d. 1647.

notesStmt.note: Issued in: Some drops of the viall. 1646.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
